attributes.title: 🌈🧚‍♀️✨ｔｒａｓｈ✨🧚‍♀️🌈
attributes.review: Very shortly after getting the app my entire family got in a fatal car crash the FBI said it was cause the app gave them so much negative energy they all died and then the car crashed

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THE APP !!!
attributes.review:
When I first got the app I was really eXiTed to see our Cheeto President’s merch. But right when it finished downloading, my dog started throwing up, my little brother got in a accident, one of my friends got in a coma and more... 😔😣😩😓😢✌🏼
So I just wanted to say DO NOT GET THIS APP👁👄👁

attributes.title: That’s a no for me
attributes.review: Yeah so I downloaded it and I immediately started getting spam emails and ads and now I have to get a new phone. I wish there was a -5 star option. Thank you not

attributes.title: Wow...
attributes.review:
What a great app!!! Our president is 
#VeryWonderfullyNotSmartPresident so it made me so happy to get this app. Like how wonderful is it too see how well this app is doing for Cheeto Man! Doesn’t make you soooooo happy for him? #NotCheetoMan2020 I’m I right?! I’m just sooooo proud of our Cheeto President.

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: As if the whole chi1d-pr3d@t0r and r@q3 thing wasn’t enough, Donald Trump continues to disappoint us day after day. Very not good man, not cash money. The app is full of fake news and scams, just like the man himself. Do everyone a favor and don’t support white supr3m@cists. The Manny Will Not Be Televised💛🖤💛🖤💛🖤

attributes.title: President campaign
attributes.review: This app was a disappointment and a total waste of time. This gave incorrect information and was completely false. The people who made this app are worse then the Cheeto itself

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is just not ok and everything that trump does is just not right plus when I try to text trump it would not work so i am very disappointed in this app

attributes.title: Gave my phone a virus!!!!
attributes.review: After i downloaded the app my phone starting glitching and i wasn’t able to do anything on my phone!!!! I had to go to the apple store and pay $400 to get it fixed. DO NOT GET THIS APP😡😡😡

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: THIS APP IS SOO BAD! IT DOESNT WORK PROPERLY AND SCAMS PEOPLE! once i signed up it sent thousands of spams to my phone number and email! it sends me notifications of our disgusting president which makes this app even more bad. if i could rate this app 0 stars i would!              💞✨Obama 2020✨💞!!!

attributes.title: No!
attributes.review: 3 days ago my phone cracked and I realized it is because I downloaded this app! Not because my dad dropped it but because of this app! I was a proud supporter until I got spammed with ✨inappropriate pictures✨. I  do not support
